plafar.persistence

Class SQLiteHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • plafar.persistence.SQLiteHelper

  • public final class SQLiteHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    SQLiteHelper is a utility class with the purpose of initializing the SQLite database. Initialization includes locating and loading the JDBC driver and getting the connection to the database

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.sql.Connection getConnection()
      This method is used to retrieve the connection to the database
      static void setDatabaseUrl(java.lang.String url)
      This method is used to set the connection url to the database, and if database's parent folder does not exist it creates it
      static void setDirectoryPath(java.lang.String path)
      This method is used to tell the SQLiteHelper what is the path of program's execution directory This is used to make sure that the external driver is found every time and no other path interfere with the helper.
      static void setExternal(boolean value)
      This method is used to specify to the SQLiteHelper if it uses or not a external connection
      static void setExternalJarName(java.lang.String name)
      This method is used to tell the SQLiteHelper what is the name of the external driver he should be looking for

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • setDatabaseUrl

        public static void setDatabaseUrl(java.lang.String url)
        This method is used to set the connection url to the database, and if database's parent folder does not exist it creates it
        Parameters:
        url - - the path to the database file

      • setExternal

        public static void setExternal(boolean value)
        This method is used to specify to the SQLiteHelper if it uses or not a external connection
        Parameters:
        value - - the boolean value

      • setExternalJarName

        public static void setExternalJarName(java.lang.String name)
        This method is used to tell the SQLiteHelper what is the name of the external driver he should be looking for
        Parameters:
        name - - the name of the external JDBC Driver jar

      • setDirectoryPath

        public static void setDirectoryPath(java.lang.String path)
        This method is used to tell the SQLiteHelper what is the path of program's execution directory This is used to make sure that the external driver is found every time and no other path interfere with the helper.
        Parameters:
        path - - the path to the execution directory

      • getConnection

        public static java.sql.Connection getConnection()
        This method is used to retrieve the connection to the database
        Returns:
        Connection - the connection instance to the database Note: if there is no connection the helper is trying to connect to a database based on the parameters available
